price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu anayajua mnayo yaficha na mnayo yatangaza.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu kwa ujuzi wake ulio kusanya kila kitu, anajua mnayo yaficha na mnayo yadhihirisha. Na hapana chochote kinacho fichikana kwake cha siri yenu na jahari yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
